scripts.dev: echo '⚠️  Use: npm run dev:start, dev:stop, dev:restart, or dev:logs'
scripts.dev:start: npm run dev:stop && pm2 start 'npx vite' --name 'liminal-chat'
scripts.dev:restart: npm run dev:stop && npm run dev:start
scripts.dev:pause-and-verify-vite-started: sleep 3 && curl -f http://localhost:5173 >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo '✅ Vite server responding on http://localhost:5173' || echo '❌ Vite server not responding on port 5173'
